thread.title: Wayne Rooney returns to haunt Everton with goal in Manchester United victory - Milford Mercury
thread.title_full: Wayne Rooney returns to haunt Everton with goal in Manchester United victory - Milford Mercury - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Milford Mercury
title: Wayne Rooney returns to haunt Everton with goal in Manchester United victory - Milford Mercury
text:
Wayne Rooney scored his first goal at Goodison Park for eight years as Manchester United coasted to a 3-0 victory on an emotional afternoon for Everton. The news of Howard Kendall's death prior to kick-off led to a subdued atmosphere inside Goodison Park and the current crop of Everton players were unable to replicate the kind of performances seen under the club's greatest manager.
 Milford Mercury.
